subject: Migration FE Review Complete - Next Steps?

review_findings: Consistent pattern across all hooks, services, contexts, components
Clean single-toggle switching between BE and AF
SSR pages correctly excluded (use env directly)

2. El Gotan: Update MongoDB Atlas IP whitelist for localhost testing

Quinn: Any files you think we missed?
